siteMetadata.title: Tigran Hakobyan's personal blog
siteMetadata.subtitle: Long-form thoughts on building software, programming and developer tools.

frontmatter.description: In this blog post, I share the ideas that I think you can start exploring today to increase your income.  All these ideas require substantial time investment in the beginning, but I think you can do them on the side while keeping your current job.
frontmatter.title: Things you can do as a developer to make more money
